title: hari smaraNeyillada
sahitya:
hari smaraNayillada bALi badukidarEnu nara janmadali janisi balavEnu hariye


caraNam 1    norasilladA Uta nUru bageyiddEnu nAriyarillada samsAravEnu 
hOri heNaguva makkaLu nUrAru iddarEnu paramArtta tiLiyadiha puruSanEnu
    caraNam 2    patishUnyavAda yauvanada rati bALEnu ati hitAdavage paragatigaLEnu 
gati naSTavAdavage ati tIrtta tapavEnu ati lObhige dAna dharmada cinteyEnu
    caraNam 3    nIru illada nelake nitya shrama paDalEnu gOkarakaNNili bayasi kAidarEnu 
kErikAgada bhUmi tAnAgi bandarEnu suregombA Uru iddarEnu
    caraNam 4    suLLanADuva kaLLanoDana geNetanavEnu haLLa hoLeyilladiha vaLyavEnu 
eLLu nuriyadavange gANiganemba pesarEnu haLLiyilladavange heggaLikeyEnu
    caraNam 5    soNTa muridavanige mane baNDatanagaLEnu eNTu sAvira neNTariddarEnu 
vaNTishibirakke jana uNDAgi bandarEnu vaikuNTha purandara viTTalanna krpeyindadhikavayya
